title: Android 14 Preview 1 is out, will officially ban installation of old apps
description: Google kicks off monthly releases of Android 14 Developer Previews.

title: Another step towards practical quantum computers

description: Testing and optimizing mobile UI performance is a crucial part of the design and development process, and integral to any game’s success.

title: Bringing together sign-in solutions and passkeys with Android's new Credential Manager
description: We are glad to announce the alpha release of Credential Manager, a new Jetpack API that allows app developers to simplify their users' authentication journey, while also increasing security with support of passkeys.

title: Hackers are selling a service that bypasses ChatGPT restrictions on malware
description: "The street finds its own uses for things"

title: How to use Android Debug Bridge for advanced troubleshooting
description: We can use the Android Debug Bridge (ADB) to perform advanced troubleshooting on our device. As long as we have any Android phone, we can make use of ADB.

title: Learn Performing Animation in .NET MAUI: Part 2
description: Custom animation allows you to create more complex and tailored animations. This blog will teach you how to create custom animations in your .NET MAUI apps.

title: Meta takes aim at bosses who don’t actually do anything
Microsoft Edge will switch to Adobe Acrobat’s PDF rendering engine
description: Does this mean Edge will start asking if you want to upgrade every time  you use it?

title: Porting Custom Controls from Xamarin Forms to Uno Platform
description: As Xamarin.Forms inches closer to the end of support, you may consider your options for migrating your mobile applications and maybe even custom controls for your ‘old’ Xamarin.Forms app, which you need to bring with you.

title: Styling Components in SwiftUI
description: SwiftUI has a great API for styling views independent of a view’s implementation. In this post, we’ll look at how we can style custom views in the same way.

title: Virgin Orbit's first UK orbital launch may have failed due to a $100 component
description: For lack of a filter, the rocket was lost
